registerationContent.answer11: Quickly register to access all features right away on the GETTR App (iOS or Android).
registerationContent.answer12: You can only access a Quick Account on the device in which it is registered. And you may lose the account access when you log out or delete the App. To access your account from multiple devices or re-access it after logging out, please upgrade your account to a Full Account.
registerationContent.answer21: Link and validate an email to your account
registerationContent.note21: Make sure your email address is valid as it is needed for login and password recovery.
registerationContent.note31: With a Quick Account, the contents will not be retrievable after you log out from GETTR.
registerationContent.question2: Upgrade to a Full Access account?

shareContent.answer11: 1. Enter your Post (up to 777 characters) into the compose box
shareContent.answer12: 2. You can include up to 6 photos, a GIF, or a video in your Post
shareContent.answer22: 1. Tap the heart-shape icon below the Post
shareContent.note21: The heart-shape icon will change from white to red for the liked post
shareContent.note22: To undo the like, tap the heart-shaped icon again and it will turn back to white
shareContent.note23: Tap the heart icon again to undo a like and the heart will turn to white.
shareContent.answer33: 3. In the "Replying to" field, enter a reply
shareContent.answer44: 3. Choose how you'd like to share the post
shareContent.answer45: Follow the instructions for the share method you selected
shareContent.answer51: To search specific hashtags or people:
shareContent.answer53: 2. Search a username (start with ‘@’) or hashtag (start with ‘#’)
shareContent.answer54: 3. Search results will be shown in the top tab
shareContent.answer55: 4. Explore other search tabs for related contents
shareContent.answer62: 1. Tap "Follow" on the account profile page
shareContent.answer64: 1. Go to the account profile page
shareContent.answer71: Blocking accounts disables them from viewing your Posts or engaging with you through direct messages, replies, follows or likes.
shareContent.answer73: 1. Go to the account profile page or one of its posts
shareContent.answer74: 2. Tap "...", located at the top right corner
shareContent.answer75: 3. Tap "Block" and follow the steps shown in the GETTR
shareContent.answer83: 1. Go to the account profile page or one of its posts
shareContent.answer84: 2. Tap "...", located at the top right corner
shareContent.answer85: 3. Tap "Mute" and follow the steps shown in the GETTR

registrationContent.answer11: Quickly register to access all features on the GETTR App (iOS or Android) right away.
registrationContent.answer12: You can only access a Quick Account on the device in which it is registered. And you may lose the account access when you log out or delete the app. To access your account from multiple devices or re-access it after logging out, please upgrade your account to a Full Access Account.
registrationContent.answer21: Link and validate an email to your account
registrationContent.note21: Make sure your email is valid as it is needed for login and password recovery.
registrationContent.note31: The Quick Account and its data is NOT retrievable after logging out
registrationContent.question1: What are the Full Access Account and the Quick Account
registrationContent.question2: Upgrade to a Full Access account
